Title: Object: La Vierge avec l'Enfant Jesus
Description: Virgin and Child with St Anthony the Great; Child holding a bell; a pig's head in the lower right corner. 1767 Etching
Curator's comments: Print after a panel formerly attributed to Correggio, in the collection of the Prussian king in palace of Sans-Souci.
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition notes: From Richard Ford's collection of prints after Correggio (1837,0408.14 to 669), purchased from him through Colnaghi's, for £250.
